typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 1000,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationBWcomplete
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
facturationBWcomplete derive(Year = split({Jour calendaire},"-")[1],
		YearMonth = split({Jour calendaire},'-')[1] + split({Jour calendaire},'-')[2]) ~> AddYearMonth
AddYearMonth filter(not({Motif commande} == 'FAS' && ({Type de facture} == 'YFAB' || {Type de facture} == 'YFAR'))) ~> exclusionFAS
exclusionFAS, plateforme exists({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exclusionLivraisonPlateforme
exclusionLivraisonPlateforme sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['guy_extraction_ventes_directes.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> facturationBWventedirecte
